title: Age of Seraphs
description: A rich, medium-fantasy civilization-building Vintage Story server where players guide seraphs to explore, settle, and shape the world. Featuring deep political intrigue, city planning, and community-driven storytelling, the game blends realism with fun progression mechanics.
features: Guide friends and players to build and expand civilizations
Engage in political intrigue and diplomacy
Plan and design cities with strategic layouts

title: MendVR
description: A chaotic PC and VR cross-play survival game built in Godot. Survive together, or don’t! the world won’t wait for you to figure it out.
